name: Pico Lake
description:
How to play

Pico Lake is a pocket-sized walk & click adventure game.

  • Walk around using the arrow keys/d-pad.
  • Press Z to open an action menu, use X to cancel. Select a verb to see available items you can interact with. Note that these options depend on your current position, actions performed and inventory.
  • You can save and restore your progress in the pause menu (press Enter)

Have fun!
